description.translate: As the fool says: meaning is only a matter of point of view.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§61-j#!A\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Comme dit si bien le fou : le sens n'est\"}","{\"text\":\"§7qu'une question de point de vue.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7As the fool says: meaning is only\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a matter of point of view.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1\"}"],color:15465761}}
